title: Beltline✔ Parking Garage✔ Laundry Service✔ Kroger✔
posting_body: ['Once an automobile assembly plant for Ford Motor Company, these fully renovated loft style apartment homes offer an unbeatable location situated in Poncey Highland, with effortless access to Midtown, Old Fourth Ward, Virginia Highlands, and Buckhead, you are never far from live music, boutiques, entertainment, and dining.', 'Ford Factory Lofts is\xa0 located on the Beltline, next to Ponce City Market and just minutes away from Freedom Park, Old Forth Ward Park and Piedmont Park.', "\xa0 With Kroger just foot steps away, Wholefoods, Starbucks, and Trader Joe's across the street.", 'We offer restaurants, lobby level laundry facility and massage therapy all on-site, everything you need is right at your fingertips.', '\xa0\xa0Beautiful thirteen foot factory size windows welcome you home with amazing city views in our unique one or two bedroom loft apartment homes.', "Ford Factory features fifteen foot ceilings, fully appointed kitchens, and access to the community's open air atrium courtyard area.", 'With a prime location, concierge service, controlled access building, FREE parking, and on-site restaurants and shopping, Ford Factory Lofts offers everything you would expect in your next home.', 'Come check us out and see what all the buzz is about!', '\xa0\xa0Visit <URL>and click on our "About Us" page and discover how you and Ford Factory can be apart of history!', '\xa0Resident Amenities* 15 Foot Ceilings* True Urban Loft style Living* Access to Open Air Atrium* Fully appointed Kitchens*', 'Amazing Views\xa0Communities Amenities* Controlled Access building* Open Air Atrium* Street Level Shopping*', 'On-site Restaurants and Retailers* Prime Location* Concierge Service* Elevators* Laundry Facility* Free Wash and Fold Service* Garage
